se.cbb.jprime.topology

Class RBTreeBranchSwapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.topology.RBTreeBranchSwapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfoProvider, Proposer

    public class RBTreeBranchSwapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Proposer
    Proposer which perturbs the topology of a bifurcating rooted tree. In order to increase the probability of accepting the new topology, corresponding lengths and/or times may also be changed according to simple heuristics.

    Currently, the tree is perturbed using NNI, SPR (also superset of NNI), and rerooting. By default, these are selected probability [0.5,0,3,0,2], but this may be substituted using setOperationWeights(...).

    Author:
    Lars Arvestad., Örjan Åkerborg., Joel Sjöstrand.

      • setOperationWeights

        public void setOperationWeights(double nni,
                       double spr,
                       double rerooting)
        Sets the operation weights for how often certain branch-swapping operations will be undertaken. The probability of an operation is its weight divided by the sum of all weights.
        Parameters:
        nni - NNI tuning parameter.
        spr - SPR tuning parameter.
        rerooting - rerooting tuning parameter.

      • swap

        public void swap(int v,
        int w)
        Disconnects the subtrees rooted at input vertices and reconnects them at each other's parents. Prerequisites: Neither argument is root. Arguments are distinct. 
                     .                           .
            / \                         / \
           /   \                       /   \
          /     \                     /     \ 
         /       \                   /       \          Vertices:
        /         \                 /         \         ---------
       /vp         \ wp            /vp         \ wp     v
      / \         / \      to     / \         / \       w
     /   \       /   \           /   \       /   \      vp = v's parent  
    /v  vs\     /w  ws\         /w  vs\     /v  ws\     wp = w's parent  
   / \   / \   / \   / \       / \   / \   / \   / \    vs = v's sibling  
  /___\ /___\ /___\ /___\     /___\ /___\ /___\ /___\   ws = w's sibling
        Parameters:
        v - first vertex.
        w - second vertex.

        public static void rootAtOutgroup(RBTree T,
                  NamesMap names,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> outgroup)
        Reroots a tree so that the leaves in the outgroup forms a monophyletic group.
        Parameters:
        T - the topology to reroot.
        names - the names of the leaves.
        outgroup - the subset of names of the outgroup.
